data.title: Pokemon Showdown Android Simulator
description: Showdown is a web-based simulator that had 5 million month visits and peeked 10,000 concurrent users
Design, implement and test Android version of Showdown
Lead a team of Android developers and review their contributions
After the first 7 days on the Play Store, it gets a rating of 4.5/1121 reviews and 27,907 net installs

data.title: Multi-GPU Bisection Algorithm for Tri-diagonal Symmetric Eigenvalue Problem
description: Take advantage of parallel programming on 4 GPUs to speed up eigenvalue calculation by approximately 60% comparing to 1 GPU
Present poster at GPU Technology Conference 2015 (San Jose, CA)
